title: 服务器崩溃，求解决
author: sd0633
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Would you like a cupcake?

Time: 1/23/15 10:20 PM
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0""
